message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CY 

The paper proposes an automatic framework for generating biographies, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the following sub-categories: 

- cs.CL (Computation and Language): This sub-category deals with natural language processing and generation, which is the core of the proposed framework. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper involves the retrieval of information from various sources to generate biographies, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The framework involves the use of machine learning techniques to generate biographies, which is a key aspect of this sub-category. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper involves the use of AI techniques to generate biographies, which is a core aspect of this sub-category. 
- cs.CY (Computers and Society): The paper discusses the impact of automated biography generation on society, which falls under the scope of this sub-category.
